Text: Ugh this show stinks since Michael left.  Can't watch any more!
just wait, here comes that fat slob roseanne
Michael was predictable and annoying.  This show has been its best since he left.
I agree that its horrible now. Introducing the camera crew was the final straw for me, but I've watched every episode and have to see it through to the end.
Too much drama. It drives me crazy that they introduced the random sound guy and created this intimate backstory out of nowhere.
wow the office is jumping the shark!! just finish this already
totally agree with apparition and powbiffbang about the camera crew. wtf? can't half tell they are out of ideas. But I've had way too many laughs to stay mad.
